version_description:
Hello Music Lovers!

We’ve made some more performance enhancements to our previous release to ensure your discovery of new music runs as smooth as possible. Don’t forget to check out our newest feature in the app:

- Collapsible Player View – Now you can easily navigate throughout the app while still having full control over your playback experience. Dive deep into playlists and collections without skipping a beat on your currently playing tunes!

As always, please email us your feedback at app_feedback@reverbnation.com. If you’re really enjoying ReverbNation Discover, please leave us a nice review or tell your friends – it really helps!

Hello Music Lovers!

Our newest update includes performance enhancements and various bug fixes. These improvements should allow you to continue discovering the new and fresh music you enjoy.

As always, please email us your feedback at app_feedback@reverbnation.com. If you’re really enjoying ReverbNation Discover, please leave us a nice review or tell your friends – it really helps!
